conclusion: Determine which container the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles from points A, B, C, and D.
Point A is above a green baffle.
Liquid from point A flows down the green baffle into container E.
Point B is above a yellow baffle.
Liquid from point B flows down the yellow baffle into container F.
Point C is above an orange baffle.
Liquid from point C flows down the orange baffle into container G.
Point D is above a pink baffle.
Liquid from point D flows down the pink baffle into container H.
Liquid from each point flows into the corresponding container directly below it.
Final answer: Liquid from A flows into E, B into F, C into G, D into H.
